name: HOLLY
description:
So basically you're a witch named Holly.

- Fly on your broom.

- Talk to your best friend.

- Make a potion.

- Enjoy yaself for like 5 minutes.

THIS GAME CONTAINS EXPLICIT LANGUAGE

The game might crash when it starts up. If that happens 1) I don't know why it does that, and 2) Try just closing it and opening it again. If that doesn't work try moving the files to your desktop or some other location

But yeah just download that zip and extract it somewhere and it should work probably perhaps.

CONTROLS

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

E - Talk

F - Get on / off broom

Space Bar (while on broom) - Broom Hop
